Posts.Content: I have a lump in my left breast and a friend said i shouldnt have a biopsy and that its a lymph node clog, and i did the biopsy, i lost weight, and needed to ask if the breast tissues are damaged, can i gain weight and gain breast tissues? Will gaining more weight give me breast tisssues? And if the lymph node is damaged from a biopsy, can the breast heal from that damage?
Posts.Title: Ques about the breast after a biopsy
